text: The Song of Names is a 2019 Canadian German Hungarian British mystery drama movie directed by François Girard and was based on the novel of the same name by Norman Lebrecht. It stars Tim Roth, Clive Owen, Stanley Townsend, Eddie Izzard, Saul Rubinek, Gerran Howell. ==Other websites== * Category:2019 drama movies Category:2010s mystery movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Canadian mystery movies Category:German drama movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:British drama movies Category:British mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by François Girard
title: The Song of Names
